comment._content: Captain Ernst August Lehmann (12 May 1886 - 7 May 1937) was a German Zeppelin captain en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ernst_A._Lehmann

comment.author: 21841229@N05
comment._content: This is not Ernst Lehmann. It's a man named Fred Lanteri(? spelling) and according to writing on photo taken in 1952. Looks nothing like the deceased airship captain.
